pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========================rinoh-typeface-texgyreheros===========================This package provides the `TeX Gyre Heros`_ typeface for use with rinohtype_.TeX Gyre Heros is based on URW Nimbus Sans L and can be used as a replacementfor Helvetica... _TeX Gyre Heros: http://www.gust.org.pl/projects/e-foundry/tex-gyre/heros.. _rinohtype: https://github.com/brechtm/rinohtype#readme
